block.p: GANTZ-Dorothy. On September 6, 2000. Beloved wife of Harry. Dear mother of William Gantz and Judy Jacobs. Step-mother of Ronald and Bruce Gantz. Dear sister of Jack and Ralph Caprow and Frances Glaser. Cherished grandmother and great-grandmother. Funeral services will be Friday, September 8, 2000, 1:30PM at Riversville Cemetery, Glenville, CT. For further information contact Hellman Memorial Chapels, 15 State Street, Spring Valley, New York 10977. 914-356-8600.
